award_title: Collaborative Research: Photocatalytic Activity Descriptors of Well-defined Surface Cobalt Sites on Carbon Nitride
subject: Credit for computational methods in photocatalysis
body:
Professor Frenkel,

Your collaborative work on photocatalytic descriptors involves machine learning-assisted spectroscopic analysisâ€”computational methods that often go uncited even when others build on them.

Ouro helps researchers share computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable and durable, rather than a zip file buried in supplementary materials. Citations capture acknowledgment, but not actual influence. Ouro makes computational work both citable and visibly used.

Let me know if you'd like to poke around.

Best,

Matt
Founder
https://ouro.foundation
